mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT prd.id, prd.req_id, prd.prod_id, prd.qty, prd.unit_id, prd.order_price, prd.order_amount, prd.order_price_tax, prd.order_amount_tax, prd.prod_name, prd.prod_code, prd.lead_time, prd.purc_qty, prd.org_id, prd.capacity, prd.purc_qty, prd.single_capacity, prd.spe_type, prd.brand_name, prd.buyer_id, bm.model, IFNULL(pbr.qty,0) - IFNULL(tp.qty,0) + prd.qty as max_qty FROM purchase_request_detail prd left join bas_material bm on prd.prod_id = bm.id left join purchase_request_main prm on prd.req_id = prm.id left join ( SELECT prm.project_id, prd.prod_id, sum( prd.qty ) AS qty, prm.category_id FROM purchase_request_detail prd LEFT JOIN purchase_request_main prm ON prd.req_id = prm.id WHERE prm.req_type = '0' and prd.del_flag = '0' AND prm.id != #{mainId} GROUP BY prm.project_id, prd.prod_id, prm.category_id ) tp on tp.prod_id = prd.prod_id and tp.project_id = prm.project_id and prm.category_id = tp.category_id left join project_bom_relation pbr on prd.prod_id = pbr.material_id and pbr.proj_id = prm.project_id and pbr.del_flag = '0' and prm.category_id = pbr.category_id WHERE prd.req_id = #{mainId} and prd.del_flag = '0'
SELECT sum(budget_amount) as order_amount_tax, pbr.proj_id, pbr.model FROM project_bom_relation pbr WHERE pbr.del_flag = '0' and pbr.proj_id = #{query.projectId} group by pbr.proj_id,pbr.model

SELECT sum(order_amount_tax) as order_amount_tax, prm.project_id, prm.category_id FROM purchase_request_detail prd inner join purchase_request_main prm on prd.req_id = prm.id WHERE prd.del_flag = '0' and prm.project_id = #{query.projectId} group by prm.project_id,prm.category_id

SELECT DISTINCT prd.id, prd.req_id, prd.prod_id, prd.qty - prd.purc_qty as qty, prd.unit_id, prd.order_price, prd.order_amount, prd.order_price_tax, prd.order_amount_tax, prd.prod_name, prd.prod_code, prd.lead_time, prd.purc_qty, prd.org_id, prd.capacity, prd.purc_qty, prd.single_capacity, prd.spe_type, prd.brand_name, bm.model, prd.qty as max_qty FROM purchase_request_detail prd left join bas_material bm on prd.prod_id = bm.id left join purchase_request_main prm on prd.req_id = prm.id left join project_bom_relation pbr on prd.prod_id = pbr.material_id and pbr.proj_id = prm.project_id and pbr.del_flag = '0' WHERE prd.req_id = #{mainId} and prd.del_flag = '0' and prd.qty > prd.purc_qty

SELECT group_concat(t.qty,'Âè∞',t.prod_name Separator '-') prodName, prm.order_total_amount_tax orderAmountTax FROM( SELECT prd.prod_name, round(sum(prd.qty),0) qty, prd.req_id FROM purchase_request_detail prd WHERE prd.req_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and prd.del_flag = '0' group by prd.prod_name,prd.req_id) t LEFT JOIN purchase_request_main prm on t.req_id = prm.id WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY t.req_id
